text:
RT @PHE_NorthEast: Flood alerts and warnings across the North East, Yorkshire, the Humber and the North West have been sounded.

Keep up to‚Ä¶

@RobStoneman @EnvAgency @YWDirectors @WildlifeTrusts We just got a manuscript accepted ... hopefully soon available to read as open access. It is vital to not approach such issues on 'them vs. us' terms. I am an environmentalist and there is a lot wrong with many managements, but often there is much more to it than we assume/feel.

RT @SCR_Mayor: Weather warnings for heavy rain and flooding have been issued across South #Yorkshire.

I am monitoring the situation closel‚Ä¶

text: @RobStoneman @EnvAgency @YWDirectors @WildlifeTrusts We don't actually have robust evidence to link burning to flooding - most is on eroding/bare peat. Moreover, we also don't know yet what rewetted, completely saturated peatlands do under such conditions (where will water go)? Very important questions to really find answers to.
